input.sentences: but the shop had many clothes
output.sentences: Betty, who was in chemotherapy for cancer,  took a shopping trip to New York where she enjoyed the mannequins in the windows.
She was especially fond of the formal, fancy dresses with many flounces.
After window shopping she went to the deli where she found decorated eggs like she had never seen before.
At the bakery on the corner she purchased a small heart-shaped cake for her husband.
Finally, she went into the wig store to find something to lift her spirits because she had lost her hair.
